Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the leeks and cook, stirring occasionally, for about 10 minutes until they are soft. Season with salt and pepper. Lower the heat to low, then stir in the cream and cheese, warming until heated through. Pour the mixture into the pie shell.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until the custard is firm and the top is golden. Let the pie rest for 10 minutes before slicing it into wedges.
